Instruction: Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into equal-sized pieces.
Place a steamer basket in a large pot and add the water.
Bring the water to a boil over medium-high heat.
Place the potatoes in the steamer basket.
Cover the pot and steam the potatoes for 15-20 minutes or until tender.
Check the potatoes by piercing them with a fork; they should be soft.
Remove the potatoes from the steamer and place them in a large bowl.
Add salt, butter, and fresh parsley to the potatoes.
Toss the potatoes gently until the butter is melted and the potatoes are evenly coated.
